# Overview

This vignette demonstrates how to retrieve and visualize the SELIC target rate using the brfinance package.

```r
# To access the data
selic <- get_selic_rate(2020, 2024)
head(selic)

# To generate an automatic graph of the data
plot_selic_rate(selic)
```
